Name: ConanExiles
Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Conan Exiles and run it.

Servername: 'Docker ConanExiles' Password: 'Docker' rconPassword: 'adminDocker'

ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files!

Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.

You can also run multiple servers with only one SteamCMD directory!
DonateText: If you like my work please

@attributes.Name: GAME_ID
@attributes.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
(https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

@attributes.Name: GAME_PARAMS
@attributes.Description: Enter your start up commands for the server.

@attributes.Name: Steam-Username
@attributes.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

@attributes.Name: Validate Installation
@attributes.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

@attributes.Name: Steam-Password
@attributes.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

@attributes.Name: Workshop Content
@attributes.Description: Enter you Workshopcontent here, you can also enter multiple WS Content ID's sperated by SPACE

@attributes.Name: TCP1 - Game Port
@attributes.Description: TCP Game Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new TCP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change your server settings)

@attributes.Name: UDP1 - Game Port
@attributes.Description: UDP Game Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change your server settings)

@attributes.Name: UDP2 - Game Port +1
@attributes.Description: UDP Game Port +1 (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change your server settings)

@attributes.Name: UDP3 - Steam Port
@attributes.Description: UDP Steam Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change your server settings)
